patterns: I want to change my career
responses:
Career change is exciting! Based on different goals:

**Quick Entry to IT:**
• Digital Marketing - 3-4 months, good opportunities
• Tally + GST - Immediate job market
• Advanced Excel - Useful everywhere

**Long-term IT Career:**
• Full Stack Web Development - High demand
• Python Programming → Data Science path
• Ethical Hacking - Cybersecurity field

**Creative Transition:**
• Graphic Designing - Creative industry
• Animation courses - Media field

**Skills Enhancement:**
• Spoken English + Personality Development

What's your timeline and preferred industry?

For excellent job opportunities, consider these high-demand courses:

**Immediate Job Market:**
• Tally + GST - Every company needs (₹15K-25K starting)
• Digital Marketing - Growing field (₹18K-30K)
• Advanced Excel - Universal demand (₹12K-20K)

**IT Industry (Higher Growth):**
• Full Stack Web Development - (₹25K-50K)
• Python Programming - (₹20K-40K)
• Data Science - (₹30K-60K)

**Stable Opportunities:**
• ICCA (Company Accountant) - Professional role
• Ethical Hacking - Cybersecurity (₹25K-45K)
• Mobile App Development - (₹22K-40K)

*Note: We provide placement assistance for all courses!

iTech Computer Institute is a leading computer education center established to provide quality IT training and skill development. We focus on practical learning with industry-relevant curriculum.
Our mission is to empower students with technical skills and knowledge needed to succeed in the digital world. We offer comprehensive courses in programming, design, and professional development.
Founded with the vision of making quality computer education accessible to all, we have trained thousands of students who are now successfully placed in various IT companies.
We are committed to excellence in education, providing hands-on training with experienced faculty and modern infrastructure. Visit our About page to learn more about our journey.
